entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this evening and ending overnight. Snow or periods of ice pellets this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening then light before morning. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 32 in the evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
